Holiday Private Dining
It's the most wonderful time of the year...indeed!
Morton's is buzzing during the holiday season, and we warmly invite you and your friends, colleagues, and family members to celebrate with us. We have something for everyone, from special menus to sparkling holiday cocktails!
Each Morton's location has a dedicated Sales and Events manager to assist you in planning a showstopping event.
Find a Location
Group Dining
Celebrate the holidays in the comfort of Morton's private dining rooms. Breakfast, lunch, reception or dinner, our team will work with you and your budget to create the perfect holiday get-together.
View Private Dining Menus
All The Extras
Elegant Amenities Include:
Morton's Signature Menu
Award-Winning Wine List
Professionally Trained Staff
Fully Private & Semi-Private Dining Areas
Upscale Decor & Holiday Adornments
Showstopping Gift Tables
AV Equipment & Wi-Fi Technology
Valet Service
Floral Arrangements
Boutique Takeaway Gifts & More!
With our longstanding legacy of excellent service, we ensure every guest feels like a VIP.
Inquire Today
Prime Platters, Delivered
You can now order Morton's catering online. Colossal shrimp cocktail, filet sandwiches, salads, mouthwatering sides and desserts delivered for any event!
FIND A LOCATION
Christmas & New Year's
Celebrate the season and ring in the new year with warm hospitality, award-winning wines & champagnes, and the best steak anywhere!
Morton's locations are open for Christmas and New Year's celebrations
Make A Reservation
Holiday Gift Cards!
Share memorable dining experiences with Morton's gift cards.
Plus, Landry's Select Club Members Earn Points!

Main content starts here, tab to start navigating
Private Dining & Catering
At Your Service
Exceptional Private Dining at Morton's
For private events featuring personalized service and chef-crafted cuisine, host your next celebration at Morton’s The Steakhouse. Offering private and semi-private dining spaces with contemporary interiors, elegant furnishing, and state-of-the-art audio/visual capabilities, our private dining experiences are sure to leave a lasting impression no matter the occasion.
View Private Dining Menus
Find A Location to Book
Catering
Only Morton's signature menu items on party trays can make the host a hero for in-home celebrations or office parties. Picture a beautiful display of colossal shrimp cocktail, miniature prime cheeseburgers, lobster cocktail, steak sandwiches...ready to serve and savor. View the menu, and choose from decadent, delectable and delicious options that will make your party a first-class affair.
View Catering Menu
Order Online
Outstanding Occasions
Each Morton's location has a dedicated Sales & Events Manager to assist you in planning a showstopping event. From business functions to birthday parties and wedding celebrations, our team of experts will coordinate every last detail.
Inquire Today
Lasting Impressions
Craft a custom menu from our selection of appetizers, USDA prime-aged steak, and decadent desserts. Premium bars, award-winning wines, and Morton's signature Martinis are also available for your pleasure.
View Menus
All The Extras

With our longstanding legacy of excellent service, we ensure every guest feels like a VIP.
Inquire Today
Group Dining & Events
Morton's private dining rooms can be transformed to meet your needs for business or social occasions. From birthdays to bar mitzvahs, from breakfast meetings to client dinners, from wedding receptions to anniversaries....the possibilities are endless.
Explore the options and find out how Morton's can help make your next event unforgettable!
Browse Event Types
National Partnerships
If you plan meetings and events on a national basis we invite you to explore Morton's National Partnership Program. We provide our National Account Partners private dining elegance with exceptional service and unparalleled access to account professionals all with Morton's world-class reputation. At Morton's, our National Partnership program is designed with the meeting, event, marketing, sales or procurement specialist from corporations and organizations around the globe exclusively in mind.  Whether you are looking to host a pharmaceutical CME program, a financial roadshow, or a technology information luncheon, Morton's is the premiere destination for all of your corporate needs.
Explore National Partnerships

Events

Main content starts here, tab to start navigating
Prime Events
Morton's strives to bring its guests the very best...whether that's through our Chef-driven food, our modern wine & spirits program, or our legendary, hospitable service. We aim to give our guests access to exclusive, behind-the-scenes Prime Events at Morton's®! We look forward to hosting you at one of our next "Prime Events"  that feature seasonal mixology classes, wine & chocolate pairings, winemaker dinners, rare scotch tastings, and so much more!
Join our mailing list to be the first to hear about upcoming events.
Join E-Club
Winemaker Dinners
Morton's is proud to work with some of the most respected wineries, vintners and wine proprietors in the world. Select Morton's locations will be offering guests an exclusive opportunity to meet these professionals during an intimate four-course wine dinner, paired with fine wines.
Learn More
Celebrity Server Events
Guests will rub elbows with some of the biggest names in sports and help their favorite athletes and sports celebrities raise funds for their preferred charities!
View Past Events
